name: Gerrymander (chairconditioning)
description:
Gerrymander is a political strategic RPG game in which you play as a politician who must balance national stats and the money you earn.

Gerrymander features fictional political parties and political figureheads which do not symbolize any specific parties or individuals. As part of Gerrymander, the player must choose one of four political parties and play the role as lead representative of the party. Gerrymander does not promote any specific political ideology, and the difficulty of the game nor the frequency of criticism from fictional reporters does not change no matter which party the player chooses.
